definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)

sentences.english: Striker Jong Tae Se, and midfielder Mun In Guk, are the "glue" of the team.
sentences.chinese: 中锋郑大世，和中锋文仁国都是这个队里德粘合剂。

sentences.english: Striker Jong Tae Se, and midfielder Mun In Guk, are the "glue" of the team.
sentences.chinese: 中锋郑大世，和中锋文仁国都是这个队里德粘合剂。

sentences.english: Colludes , one of center's necessary techniques.
sentences.chinese: 勾手，中锋必备的技艺之一。

sentences.english: What helped was the infusion of energy from backup center DJ Mbenga.
sentences.chinese: 这位替补中锋姆本加注入了能量。

sentences.english: When healthy, Bynum is among the best in the league at his position.
sentences.chinese: 当健康时，拜纳姆是联盟中最好的中锋。

sentences.english: The star half-back jetted toward the goal line .
sentences.chinese: 那个球星中锋冲向球门线。

sentences.english: The centre forward of our school team was sent off the field by the referee for roughing.
sentences.chinese: 我们校队的中锋因动作粗野被裁判判罚出场。

sentences.english: So mentions, the Bolie Luo river acknowledged that he is the team genuine center.
sentences.chinese: 如此说来，博列洛承认自己是球队真正的中锋。

sentences.english: On that form he's the best centre-forward in the world.
sentences.chinese: 当他恢复那种状态，那么他就是世界最佳中锋。

sentences.english: As it refers to players, a team's center and forwards.
sentences.chinese: 同样的也指队里的中锋和前锋。

sentences.english: He suddenly played without a striker.
sentences.chinese: 他突然采用无中锋踢法。

sentences.english: Their positions were reversed; John played centre forward and Tom played fullback.
sentences.chinese: 他们的位置调换了，约翰踢中锋，汤姆改踢后卫。

sentences.english: "He's done a great job, " said Bucks center Andrew Bogut.
sentences.chinese: “干得很漂亮，”雄鹿中锋博古特说。

sentences.english: Liverpool are eyeing Sevilla centre-forward Alvaro Negredo.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦对塞维利亚中锋内格雷多很感兴趣。

sentences.english: It is a center's responsibility to get the football to the quarterback.
sentences.chinese: 中锋的责任是把足球传给边卫。

sentences.english: And the quarterback who is the main, pretty much the center,
sentences.chinese: 而且四分卫是很主要的，简直就是中锋。

definition: to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
